content: I was curious about how addition is defined for Nats, so clicked on + to get to HAdd.hAdd. This is a type class, meaning an instance is defined in Nat somewhere. but how to find that instance, I can't seem to find any way to do that
#synth HAdd Nat Nat _ and look at the infoview
You may want to set_option pp.explicit true to see past the instHAdd.
thanks! I had read about synth on the net, but that wasn't helping, the set_option worked
You can also explore terms by hovering over them in the infoview with your mouse (on VSCode).
Sabbir Rahman has marked this topic as resolved.

add.gif

You can do it all with clicking, you just have to go the right way. I ctrl-click at the end but it's mostly hovering.

You can do it all with clicking, you just have to go the right way. I ctrl-click at the end but it's mostly hovering.

This hover-ception didn't cross my mind. Thanks a lot!
